Selected Answer: A
The giveaway = "review cloud resource costs frequently...."

The most effective approach for planning and managing cloud infrastructure expenditures is:

A. Review cloud resource costs frequently, because costs change often based on use

Cloud resource costs can fluctuate based on usage patterns, resource allocation, and various pricing models. Regularly reviewing these costs helps ensure that your organization stays within budget, identifies any unexpected expenses, and adjusts resources as needed. This proactive approach is crucial for managing and optimizing cloud spending effectively.

Cloud Data Loss Prevention (DLP) is a cloud-based service that helps you discover, classify, and protect sensitive data across your Google Cloud Platform (GCP) environment. DLP can help you identify and protect PII, financial information, intellectual property, and other sensitive data.

Cloud Data Loss Prevention (DLP) is a fully managed service that helps you discover, classify, and protect sensitive data, including PII, within your Google Cloud environment. It offers a set of powerful tools and techniques to identify and protect sensitive information, helping you meet data privacy and compliance requirements.

By leveraging Cloud Data Loss Prevention (DLP), your organization can proactively identify, classify, and protect personally identifiable information (PII) within your Google Cloud environment. It helps reduce the risks associated with handling sensitive data, ensuring compliance and data privacy.

A is correct. Storage Transfer Service is a fully managed service that helps you transfer data from on-premises file servers to Cloud Storage. It can transfer terabytes of data quickly and securely, using your existing Dedicated Interconnect connection.

Selected Answer: A
A is correct

The Storage Transfer Service is a managed service provided by Google Cloud that simplifies the process of transferring data to and from Cloud Storage.

The Storage Transfer Service simplifies the data migration process by automating many of the steps involved. It provides a reliable and scalable solution for migrating large amounts of data from on-premises file servers to Cloud Storage. However, it's important to note that the Storage Transfer Service relies on internet connectivity for data transfer, so consider your network bandwidth and transfer speed requirements when using this service.
A. Storage Transfer Service

Answer is A:

How are you going to handle security traffic between containers when it's serverless?

The Options are a bit misleading. If it states, CloudRun with VPC Service Controls, then, it would have been easier choice to pick C. Please refer to this link (https://cloud.google.com/blog/products/serverless/cloud-run-gets-enterprise-grade-network-security-with-vpc-sc) where it states: 
VPC Service Controls (VPC SC) give you fine-grained control over how data moves into and out of a VPC SC service perimeter. VPC SC provides an additional layer of security defense for Google Cloud that is independent of Identity and Access Management (IAM). IAM currently enables granular identity based access control; VPC SC enables a security parameter that lets you secure your cloud resources and set up private connectivity to Google Cloud’s APIs and services.

This helps protect against risks including:

Data exfiltration from malicious insiders or compromised code

Accidental public exposure of private data, caused by misconfigured IAM policies

Access from unauthorized networks using stolen credentials

Selected Answer: C
I think is C. if your application does not need that level of cluster configuration and monitoring, then fully managed Cloud Run might be the right solution for you.

Selected Answer: A
https://cloud.google.com/kubernetes-engine/docs/concepts/access-control#rbac
If you primarily use GKE, and need fine-grained permissions for every object and operation within your cluster, Kubernetes RBAC is the best choice.

What Google Cloud product or feature should your organization use?
